definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: It is a neurosis which feeds upon itself .
sentences.chinese: 這是一種自給自足的神經官能症。

sentences.english: Cases with clockwise horizontal plane T loop may easily suffer from cardiac neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 環順轉者易於發生心臟神經官能症。

sentences.english: Insomnia mainly belongs to neurosis and involutional syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 其臨牀主要見於神經官能症和抑鬱症。

sentences.english: He is majoring in the treatment of medical neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 他主修的是神經官能症的治療。
